resources.string: SquadUp
\u00A9 2022 SquadUp Inc.
Displays recent conversations and enables messaging with users or groups.
Shows a screen of recent conversations.
Displays a scrollable list of recent conversations in the app.
Reusable component to render individual conversation items.
Displays group lists, supports search, and allows starting conversations.
Shows a list of groups with search functionality.
Renders a scrollable list of all available groups.
Allows creation of public, private, or password-protected groups. Tap here for details.
Displays group items with Avatar, Status, Title, and Subtitle.
Joins password-protected groups. Tap here to learn more.
Displays members of a group. Tap here for details.
Adds users to a group. Tap here to learn more.
Transfers group ownership between users. Tap here for details.
Displays the list of banned group members. Tap here to learn more.
Provides information about a group. Tap here to learn more.
Displays user lists, supports search, and enables conversations.
Shows a scrollable list of app users with search functionality.
Displays detailed information about a user. Tap here for details.
Renders user list items with Avatar, Status, and Title.
Manages sending and receiving messages in user or group conversations. Click here for details.
Displays user or group details using SDK objects.
Renders a real-time list of messages with updates.
Supports sending text, images, videos, and custom messages.
Displays call logs with an option to view details.
Shows recent call logs in the app.
Enables calls with user or group details displayed.
Allows users to initiate calls within the app.
Displays user or group avatars, with initials as fallback.
Indicates user status as online or offline.
Shows the count of unread messages in components like conversations.
Displays message states such as sent, delivered, read, or failed.
Reusable list component for Users, Groups, Conversations, etc.
Automatically detects and sets the user’s language based on device/browser settings.

Lists all users available in the app. Click here to learn more.

Displays file messages. Tap here for details.
